---
title: Publication
---

```{r ref}
library(RefManageR)
bib <- ReadBib("./jtpubs.bib", check = FALSE)
myopts <- BibOptions(
  style = "markdown",
  sorting = "ydnt",
  no.print.fields = list("issn", "url", "urldate")
  )
```

## Journal Publications

```{r, results = "asis"}
bib[bibtype = "article"]
```

## Conference Proceedings

```{r, results = "asis"}
bib[bibtype = "inproceedings"]
```

## Books co-edited

```{r, results = "asis"}
bib[bibtype = "book"]
```

## Reports 

```{r, results = "asis"}
bib[bibtype = "techreport"]
```
